help:
*Add a role*
`.iam ROLE`

*Remove a role:*
`.iamnot ROLE`
(ROLE being job acronym, DRK, SAM, BLM, etc.)

*Add raid leader tag (to post on #clear_screenshots)*
`.iam RL`

*Add guest tag (to not receive pings anymore)*
`.iam guest`

Please note that you still need to remove your previous roles manually.
If you've accidentally deleted your message in LFG/LFM channel, please note that the moderation team cannot help you bypass the posting limit. Please post on #party_finder until your limit is lifted.
welcomeMessage:
***PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING!***
 
Hello :NAME:! I am the Europe Raiding Central Bot. Please make sure to read the rules in #announcements before posting.
 
In order to identify yourself and post on our channels, you need to assign yourself a job role and a datacenter role. Please reply to this private message with one of the following commands based on your primary role in FFXIV (exactly as written below):
 
```
.iam PLD
.iam WAR
.iam DRK
.iam GNB
.iam WHM
.iam SCH
.iam AST
.iam MCH
.iam BRD
.iam DNC
.iam BLM
.iam SMN
.iam RDM
.iam MNK
.iam DRG
.iam NIN
.iam SAM
```
 
You will also need to assign your relevant datacenter in order to see the recruitment categories:
 
```
.iam Light
.iam Chaos
```
 
To learn more about adding/removing roles, type:
`.help`
 
Do not hesitate to contact the admins should you have any questions.
 
See you soon!
